page.title: 18EMPLOYMENT WOLSTANTON.
page.content: A questionaire was given to 39 people at random in Morris Square.The results showed that out of the 39,20 lived in Wolstanton and 19 did not.Those who had lived in Wolstanton had done so for an average of 25years.Only 10 out of these people worked in the village.We also conted a survey in the school about parentsÂ£ jobs.If we just look at the mothers we find that 56 work full-time, 67 part-time and 67 do not work at all. Taking all the parents into account;55 work in factories,54 in offices,34 have outside jobs,26 are self-employed and 23 work in shops.Out of all these people at work,36 are working on shifts.
